head.supplied: No 4 ¶ VICTORIA ¶ . ¶ Payable at Pay Office ¶ . ¶ SALARIES. ¶ L. 1.—[Clause 20 of Regulations.]...

div.p: No. 606, unit 731, VPRS 3181 Town Clerk's file series 1, VA 511 Melbourne, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: See also M to E. FitzGibbon, 3 August 1864 (in this edition as 64-08-03a). No 4

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
The
Corporation of Melbourne
Corporation of Melbourne above GOVERNMENT OF VICTORIA, deleted.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
Dr. to the undermentioned persons for Wages ,
Salaries and deleted before Wages. from the first day of August to the third day of August 1 864, inclusive .

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.p: We, the undersigned, do hereby acknowledge to have received from Dr Ferd. Mueller. the sums opposite to our several Names, being in full of our Salaries and Wages for the periods herein specified.

p.seg: I certify that the individuals named in the foregoing Account were actually employed in the Situation and during the period specified opposite the name of each respectively.
